Method Detail

accept

public Invoice accept(Invoice inputInvoice)
               throws NotEnoughCreditsException,
                      UpperCreditLimitReachedException,
                      MaxAmountPerDayExceededException,
                      UnexpectedEntityException
Description copied from interface: InvoiceService
Accepts the given invoice

Specified by:
accept in interface InvoiceService
Throws:
NotEnoughCreditsException - No funds to accept the invoice
UpperCreditLimitReachedException - The receiver account would pass the upper limit
MaxAmountPerDayExceededException - The payer account has exceeded the maximum amount today for the invoice's transfer type
UnexpectedEntityException - The given invoice cannot be accepted (for example, is not pending)

alertExpiredSystemInvoices

public int alertExpiredSystemInvoices(java.util.Calendar time)
Description copied from interface: InvoiceServiceLocal
Process expired invoices, generating a member alert for system to member invoices that expires today, according to the AlertSettings.idleInvoiceExpiration

Specified by:
alertExpiredSystemInvoices in interface InvoiceServiceLocal
Returns:
The number of expired invoices

sendAutomatically

public Invoice sendAutomatically(Invoice invoice)
Description copied from interface: InvoiceServiceLocal
Sends an invoice, without testing the logged member. Should be called from internal procedures that send invoice (like account fees)
